-  rotated(by:around:) 

Instance Method# rotated(by:around:)

iOS 26.0+iPadOS 26.0+Mac Catalyst 26.0+macOS 26.0+tvOS 26.0+visionOS 26.0+watchOS 26.0+

```
func rotated(
    by quaternion: simd_quatf,
    around pivot: Point3DFloat
) -> Rect3DFloat
```

## [ Parameters ](/documentation/Spatial/Rect3DFloat/rotated(by:around:)-9yw64#parameters)

`quaternion`The quaternion that defines the rotation.

`pivot`The center of rotation.

## [Return Value](/documentation/Spatial/Rect3DFloat/rotated(by:around:)-9yw64#return-value)

A point that’s rotated by the specified rotation.

## [Discussion](/documentation/Spatial/Rect3DFloat/rotated(by:around:)-9yw64#discussion)

Returns a rectangle that’s rotated by a quaternion around a specified pivot.
